author: Minyvonne Burke
title: Mayor had cops crack down on gatherings. His wife among the violators.
description: My wife "exhibited a stunning lack of judgment," Alton Mayor Brant Walker said in a statement on Facebook after she was found to be among a group who gathered at a local bar.
content:
The mayor of a southern Illinois city said his wife was among a group of people who violated the state's stay-at-home order to hang out at a local bar.
On Sunday morning, police in Alton, near the Missouri border, broke up a gathering at Hiram's Tavern that … [+2914 chars]
